entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
